synopsis.text: Nagiâ€™s peaceful existence as a local deity spirit in the town of Kannagi is disrupted when her sacred tree is cut down, leading her to take physical form as a result of Jin Mikuriya's wooden carving. Now living with Jin, Nagi embarks on a mission to purge the land of impurities with the help of a magical wand. However, with her powers dwindling due to the loss of her sacred tree, Nagi must gather followers and gain popularity to regain her strength. As Nagi competes with her sister, Zange, who has become a local celebrity and boasts greater power, she faces daily challenges and adventures with Jin by her side. Together, they navigate the complexities of Nagi's new life and the pursuit of becoming a popular idol in this captivating and heartwarming tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
